definition: one's own (child) (i.e. one's child by birth)/biological (parents)/birth (parents)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: My biological mother was a young unwed college graduate student and she decided to put me up for adoption.
sentences.chinese: 我的親生母親是一個年輕的沒有結匯棠大學畢業生。

sentences.english: Her own parents were later reunited with her in France.
sentences.chinese: 後來，她的親生父母在法國和她團聚了。

sentences.english: The old man treated her as his own daughter.
sentences.chinese: 這老人待她就像他自己的親生女兒。

sentences.english: The child in whose veins flows the blood of William Turner? where?
sentences.chinese: 那個威廉特納的親生骨肉呢？

sentences.english: Thy very children curse thee to thy face (William Cowper).
sentences.chinese: 你親生的兒女們竟公開詛咒你。

sentences.english: It was there that he fathered seven children with his own daughter.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，他的父親與他的七個孩子的親生女兒。

sentences.english: Every white- robed angelic child carried a candle. He noticed that one child's candle was not lighted.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他認出手持無光蠟燭的小孩就是他的親生女兒。

sentences.english: They have cherished the child as one of their own.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這個小孩當作自己的親生子女來撫養。

sentences.english: However, why did these parents abandon their own babies?
sentences.chinese: 但父母究竟爲什麼要丟棄自己的親生骨肉？

sentences.english: He had seventy sons of his own, for he had many wives.
sentences.chinese: 基甸有七十個親生的兒子，因爲他有許多的妻。

sentences.english: One day he might try to convince the professor's own child.
sentences.chinese: 也許有一天他會設法讓教授的親生孩子相信他。

sentences.english: PeiWenDi suddenly appeared, but with own daughter jade beads become strangers.
sentences.chinese: 裴文棣突然出現，但卻與親生女兒玉珠形同陌路。

sentences.english: Mr Bennet, how can you speak so unkindly of your own children?
sentences.chinese: 班納特先生，你怎麼能這樣無情地說自己的親生女兒？

sentences.english: Her sister and sister-in-law get along better than real sisters.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐和小姑子的感情比親生姐妹還要好。

sentences.english: DNA test showed that Yin was the girl's biological father, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱，DNA鑑定表明殷是女嬰的親生父親。

sentences.english: And why is he willing to use his own son to abduct them?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他願意利用親生兒子來誘拐女人？

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
